resources.string: Ngawi Goverment officially announced its much-anticipated Hat; the Ngawi Hat, on October 4. We attended Ngawi`s event, mirroring the main one taking place in Ngawi, Indonesia, where the firm unwrapped the new Indonesia Treasure which will apparently usurp Indonesianâ€™s long-standing Borobudor National Treasure.
